name: HomeScreen
description:
Goal: Sticky is lonely all by himself on the home screen. Get him to the Internet!

Controls:

W or Up - Jump

A/D or Left/Right - Run

Wall Jump: Press W or Up when against a wall to leap off it!

Learning to leave home for the first time is hard. Especially when you're a newborn stick figure. The heartwarming tale of sticky and his adventures leaving his home screen to find love!
